column1: On [[11 October]] [[1966]], [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] wrote '''[[Letters not published in "The Letters of J.R.R. Tolkien"

column2: Mrs.]] Tolkien's Mediterranean cruise. Work on books and manuscripts.

column1: *'''Publication:''' Excerpts from the letter have been published in [[SEVEN 27
column2: ''SEVEN'', Volume 27]] (p. 49). Another part of the letter was published in ''[[The J.R.R. Tolkien Companion and Guide
column3: The J.R.R. Tolkien Companion and Guide: Chronology]]'' (p. 676; the letter is also referred to on p. 675, entry for 6 October 1966).
